text: Giulio Paradisi (born 21 March 1934) was an Italian movie director, actor and screenwriter. He was born in Rome. He began his career as an actor in Alessandro Blasetti's Too Bad She's Bad. His best known works as a director include: Terzo Canale - Avventura a Montecarlo (1970), The Visitor (1979), Tesoromio (1979) and Spaghetti House (1982). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:Italian movie directors Category:Italian screenwriters Category:Italian movie actors Category:Writers from Rome Category:Actors from Rome
title: Giulio Paradisi
